column4: hi i have a problem with my network card. i am in monitor mode, and i need the card to stay on chanel 10 but it keeps surfing through 1-12 or something. how do i make my wireless card stay on channel 10?

hi i have a problem with my network card. i am in monitor mode, and i need the card to stay on chanel 10 but it keeps surfing through 1-12 or something. how do i make my wireless card stay on channel 10?
I thought that you set the channel on the router, not the card.  The card will just scan all channels
yea but i thought i could set the card as well
